## DateFnsDateApi class

Date api using DateFnsJS, used for obtaining DateApi wrapper object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DateFnsDateApi implements DateApi<Date> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> DateApi&lt;Date&gt;
